name: Chocolate Bark
author: wanda
summary: This is the easiest recipe I think I own. My kids are always asking me to make it because it is so good!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line an 11x17-inch rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper
Spread saltine crackers on baking sheet in a single layer, salted sides up
Combine butter and brown sugar in a saucepan; melt together over medium heat, stirring well until mixture turns a caramel color, about 5 minutes
Pour caramel mixture over crackers and spread evenly
Bake in the preheated oven until just bubbly, about 5 minutes
Remove from oven and let cool briefly
Melt chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl in the microwave in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes
Pour chocolate over crackers and spread evenly
Transfer baking sheet to the refrigerator and chill until bark hardens, about 1 hour
